workflow_yaml_content:
name: Custom YAML Test Workflow
description: A custom workflow created from YAML content to test cache restoration
inputs:
  task_description:
    type: string
    description: Task to be performed
workflow:
  goal: Test YAML content persistence across server restarts
  root: discovery
  tree:
    discovery:
      goal: Discover and analyze the test requirements
      acceptance_criteria:
        analysis_complete: Analyzed the YAML content restoration requirements
        test_plan_ready: Created a test plan for validation
      next_allowed_nodes:
      - implement
    implement:
      goal: Implement the test workflow steps
      acceptance_criteria:
        code_working: Implementation is functional
        tests_passing: All tests are passing
      next_allowed_nodes:
      - validate
    validate:
      goal: Validate the complete solution
      acceptance_criteria:
        validation_complete: Solution has been thoroughly validated
        documentation_updated: Documentation reflects the changes
      next_allowed_nodes:
      - complete
    complete:
      goal: Finalize the test workflow
      acceptance_criteria:
        final_review: Final review completed successfully
      next_allowed_nodes: []

inputs.task_description: Test YAML content workflow restoration across server restarts

completed_criteria.analysis_complete: Analyzed the complete workflow restoration system including cache persistence, session state management, and YAML content storage
completed_criteria.test_plan_ready: Created comprehensive test plan to validate YAML content workflows survive server restarts and can be properly restored

current_item: Test YAML content workflow restoration across server restarts
